OOC: Oops.  Here's the other half of my last message.

::Pyrotaur/Aquataur::
       Pyrotaur speaks up first.  "I'm Pyrotaur.  I'm the dolt that 
accidently gave our boss a mean streak."  He looks over to Aquataur.  "I just 
thought I'd save you the trouble."

       Aqua taur growls at him.  "I'm Aquataur.  I'm the science officer and 
medic of the team.  I'd be happy to offer my services should they be 
nescesary."

--part1_112.4aa16e2.28d56ea9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
